code: import React,{useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Admin(){const[formData,setFormData]=useState({title:'',description:'',duration:'',location:''});const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{await axios.post('http://localhost:5000/opportunities',formData);alert('Opportunity created successfully!');setFormData({title:'',description:'',duration:'',location:''});}catch(error){alert('Error creating opportunity. Please try again.');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{padding:'20px'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Admin Panel - Create Opportunity"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Opportunity Title",value:formData.title,onChange:e=>setFormData({...formData,title:e.target.value}),required:true,style:{marginBottom:'10px',display:'block'}})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{placeholder:"Description",value:formData.description,onChange:e=>setFormData({...formData,description:e.target.value}),required:true,style:{marginBottom:'10px',display:'block',width:'300px',height:'100px'}})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Duration (e.g., 3 months)",value:formData.duration,onChange:e=>setFormData({...formData,duration:e.target.value}),required:true,style:{marginBottom:'10px',display:'block'}})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Location",value:formData.location,onChange:e=>setFormData({...formData,location:e.target.value}),required:true,style:{marginBottom:'10px',display:'block'}})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Create Opportunity"})]})]});}export default Admin;
